snippet.title: Car catches fire on busy Coast road
snippet.content:
DASHCAM footage has captured a car engulfed in flames on a busy Coast road.
The short video shows the vehicle surrounded by smoke and fire on Nicklin Way, near Caloundra about 1.30pm this afternoon.
Facebook posts indicate the incident happened in the south-bound lane.
A Queensland Fire and Rescue Service spokesperson said crews attended to put out the blaze, but it was not clear what caused it.
